attributes.action: Ban and Outlaw Hunting of all animals outside of a food source and Clothing.
attributes.background: In the news, there is outrage about the killing of Cecil the Lion. While I am a carnivore and do eat meat, I believe the needless hunting of animals for no reason other than for killing for fun or a thrill is disgusting and a disgrace. A lot of animals are going extinct and some are already gone.
